articles.description: Jamie Smith offers admirable resistance but India's superb bowlers complete a thumping 337-run victory over England in the second Test at Edgbaston.
articles.title: England vs India: Akash Deep bowls tourists to famous win

articles.description: Watch live coverage from day seven of Wimbledon featuring Sonay Kartal, Cameron Norrie, Aryna Sabalenka and Carlos Alcaraz.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 LIVE: Kartal vs Pavlyuchenkova, Norrie vs Jarry, Alcaraz & Sabalenka also in action

articles.description: McLaren's Lando Norris takes his first home victory in a chaotic, dramatic, rain-affected British Grand Prix.
articles.title: British Grand Prix result: Lando Norris wins dramatic Silverstone race from Oscar Piastri

articles.description: Mathieu van der Poel edges out Tadej Pogacar in a sprint finish to win stage two of the Tour de France and claim the leader's yellow jersey.
articles.title: Tour de France: Mathieu van der Poel edges out  Tadej Pogacar in sprint finish to win stage two

articles.description: Play is stopped in Sonay Kartal's last-16 match at Wimbledon as the electronic line calling system fails to call a ball out.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Play stopped in Sonay Kartal's match against Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova after electronic line calling fails

articles.description: Bayern Munich's Jamal Musiala will be out for a "long period" after suffering a broken leg and dislocated ankle during Saturday's World Cup Club defeat by Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Bayern Munich: Jamal Musiala out for 'long period' with broken leg and dislocated ankle

articles.description: Norway face Finland at Euro 2025 - watch live stream and follow live scores and radio commentary.
articles.title: Norway vs Finland LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 line-ups, kick-off time & updates

articles.description: Arsenal complete the signing of midfielder Martin Zubimendi from Real Sociedad in a deal worth almost £60m.
articles.title: Martin Zubimendi: Arsenal sign Sociedad midfielder in £60m deal

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions should "strip things back" and adopt a more simple style of play, says former winger Chris Ashton.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Chris Ashton on style of play & Test XV

articles.description: Arsenal are in talks with Sporting about a deal to sign Sweden striker Viktor Gyokeres
articles.title: Viktor Gyokeres transfer news: Arsenal in talks to sign striker
